title: Dickwella Estate achieves all-time record price
body_lines: At the weekly E-Auction held on 18-19 May Dickwella Estate achieved an all-time record price of Rs. 2,100 per kg for a BOP grade in the Uva Medium Region.
This line of tea was marketed by Forbes & Walker Tea Brokers Ltd.
This Estate is managed by Malwatte Valley Plantations under the stewardship of Regional Manager Chaminda Perera and veteran Factory Head A.M. Shajahan.
